instructions: This is a brand new character sheet for The Expanse RPG, which is published by Green Ronin Publishing and uses a slightly modified version of their Modern AGE System.

useroptions.description: All sheet rolls are sent to all players in chat by default. Query Whisper option gives you a prompt with each roll of whether or not the roll should be sent privately only to yourself and the GM. Always Whisper Rolls will send all rolls only to yourself and the GM.

useroptions.displayname: Show the character name in roll results
